Source.Name: perl-File-Which
Source.Summary: File::Which - Perl implementation of the which utility as an API.
Source.Description: File::Which finds the full or relative paths to executable programs on the system. This is normally the function of which utility. which is typically implemented as either a program or a built in shell command. On some platforms, such as Microsoft Windows it is not provided as part of the core operating system. This module provides a consistent API to this functionality regardless of the underlying platform.
